title: Spam Text
description: The SMS Spam Collection is a public set of SMS labeled messages that have been collected for mobile phone spam research. The task involves classifying the messages into spam or ham (i.e. not-spam).

id.name: Id
id.description: Unique identifier for each sample in the dataset.

features.name: Message
features.example: Squeeeeeze!! This is christmas hug.. If u lik my frndshp den hug me back.. If u get 3 u r cute:) 6 u r luvd:* 9 u r so lucky;) None? People hate u:
